listener.description: Uses template hooks to spit into templates

phrases.phrase: The user group for in-game Founders. The names of Pirates of people in this group will appear in gold.
The maximum notoriety level obtainable in-game.
The maximum level obtainable for in-game skills.
The current maximum level obtainable for in-game weapons.
Click on a pirate name to view details:
Forces all image content into card.
Likes your comment on a pirate
The notoriety level is too low for some skill levels you've set.
No one has liked this pirate yet.
Please enter a reason for reporting this pirate.
Remove current picture before uploading a new one.
The requested pirate could not be found.
Someone comments on a pirate that you have commented on
Someone comments on one of your pirates
Someone likes one of your pirates
Someone likes your comment on a pirate
The specified pirate cannot be found. Please enter a pirate's entire name.
Thank you for reporting this pirate.
There are no pirates to display.
The pirate has been saved successfully.
This is a directory of all member pirates.
This user has not entered any pirates.
{username}'s pirate: {pirate} has gotten a new name.
{username}'s pirate: {pirate} has a new card picture.
You have not entered any pirates.
Are you sure you want to like this comment?
Are you sure you want to like this pirate?
Are you sure you want to unlike this comment?
Are you sure you want to unlike this pirate?
There are no polls to display.

templates.template: {xen:phrase pirateProfile_x_liked_your_comment_on_ys_pirate_z, 'name={xen:helper username, $user, 'subject'}', 'owner={$content.pirate.user.username}', 'pirate_params= href="{xen:link pirates/card, $content.pirate}" class="PopupItemLink"', 'pirate={$content.pirate.name}'}.

{xen:phrase pirateProfile_x_also_commented_on_ys_pirate, 'name={xen:helper username, $user, 'subject'}', 'owner={$content.username}', 'pirate_attributes=href="{xen:link pirates/card, $content}" class="PopupItemLink OverlayTrigger" data-overlayoptions="{"fixed":false}"', 'pirate={$content.name}'}

{xen:phrase pirateProfile_x_commented_on_your_pirate, 'name={xen:helper username, $user, 'subject'}', 'pirate_attributes=href="{xen:link pirates/card, $content}" class="PopupItemLink OverlayTrigger" data-overlayoptions="{"fixed":false}"', 'pirate={$content.name}'}

{xen:phrase pirateProfile_x_liked_your_pirate, 'name={xen:helper username, $user, 'subject'}', 'pirate_attributes=href="{xen:link pirates/card, $content}" class="PopupItemLink OverlayTrigger" data-overlayoptions="{"fixed":false}"', 'pirate={$content.name}' }

{xen:phrase pirateProfile_x_has_added_a_new_pirate_y, 'username={xen:helper username, $user, 'primaryText'}', 'pirate={$content.name}' }

{xen:phrase pirateProfile_notoriety} {xen:phrase pirateProfile_pirate_level}: {$content.level}

{xen:phrase pirateProfile_xs_pirate_y_has_been_updated, 'username={xen:helper username, $user, 'primaryText'}', 'pirate={$content.name}' }

{$extra}

{xen:phrase pirateProfile_xs_pirate_y_has_joined_guild_z, 'username={xen:helper username, $user, 'primaryText'}', 'pirate={$content.name}', 'guild={$guild.new}' }

{xen:phrase pirateProfile_formerly_x, 'old=in "{$guild.old}"'}

{xen:phrase pirateProfile_xs_pirate_y_has, 'username={xen:helper username, $user, 'primaryText'}', 'pirate={$content.name}' } {xen:phrase pirateProfile_reached} {$skill} {xen:phrase pirateProfile_pirate_level} {$level}! {xen:phrase pirateProfile_leveled} {$skill} ({$level}), {xen:phrase pirateProfile_and} {$skill} ({$level}).

{xen:phrase pirateProfile_congrats}

{xen:phrase pirateProfile_x_liked_ys_pirate, 'name={xen:helper username, $user, 'primaryText'}', 'username={xen:helper username, $owner}', 'pirate_attributes=href="{xen:link pirates/card, $content}" class="OverlayTrigger" data-overlayoptions="{"fixed":false}"', 'pirate={$content.name}' } {xen:phrase pirateProfile_x_liked_your_pirate, 'name={xen:helper username, $user, 'primaryText'}', 'pirate_attributes=href="{xen:link pirates/card, $content}" class="OverlayTrigger" data-overlayoptions="{"fixed":false}"', 'pirate={$content.name}' }

{xen:phrase pirateProfile_xs_pirate_y_has_gotten_new_name, 'username={xen:helper username, $user, 'primaryText'}', 'pirate={$content.name}' }

{xen:phrase pirateProfile_formerly_x, 'old={$name.old}'}
{xen:phrase pirateProfile_xs_pirate_y_has_new_card_picture, 'username={xen:helper username, $user, 'primaryText'}', 'pirate={$content.name}' }

{xen:phrase pirateProfile_xs_pirate_y_is_now_a_z_in_r, 'username={xen:helper username, $user, 'primaryText'}', 'pirate={$content.name}', 'rank={$rank.new}', 'type={$type}' }

{xen:phrase pirateProfile_formerly_x, 'old=a "{$rank.old}"'}
• {xen:phrase pirateProfile_your_pirates}

<xen:title>{xen:phrase pirateProfile_action_pirate, 'action={xen:phrase pirateProfile_add}'}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:members, $visitor}">{$visitor.username}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:pirates, $visitor}">{xen:phrase pirateProfile_pirates}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link 'pirates/new'}" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay AutoValidator" id="pirateProfileAdd" data-redirect="on"> <xen:include template="pirateProfile_form"> <xen:set var="$action">{xen:phrase pirateProfile_add}</xen:set> </xen:include> </form>

{xen:phrase pirateProfile_pirates}

{xen:phrase receive_alert_when_someone}...

  • {xen:phrase pirateProfile_someone_likes_one_of_your_pirates}

  • {xen:phrase pirateProfile_someone_comments_on_one_of_your_pirates}

  • {xen:phrase pirateProfile_someone_comments_on_a_pirate_that_you_have_commented_on}

  • {xen:phrase pirateProfile_someone_likes_your_comment_on_pirate}

<xen:title>{$user.username} - {xen:if $like, '{xen:phrase pirateProfile_unlike_comment}', '{xen:phrase pirateProfile_like_comment}'}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:members, $user}">{$user.username}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:pirates, $user}">{xen:phrase pirateProfile_pirates}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:pirates/card, $pirate}">{$pirate.name}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link 'pirates/comment-like', $pirate, 'comment={$comment.pirate_comment_id}'}" method="post" class="xenForm">
<dl class="ctrlUnit fullWidth"> <dt></dt> <dd> <xen:if is="{$like}"> {xen:phrase pirateProfile_you_sure_you_want_to_unlike_this_comment} <xen:else /> {xen:phrase pirateProfile_you_sure_you_want_to_like_this_comment} </xen:if> </dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd><input type="submit" value="{xen:if $like, '{xen:phrase pirateProfile_unlike_comment}', '{xen:phrase pirateProfile_like_comment}'}" accesskey="s" class="button primary" autofocus="true" /></dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>

{$comment.username} - {xen:phrase pirateProfile_members_who_liked_this_comment} {$user.username} {xen:phrase pirateProfile_pirates} {$pirate.name}
{xen:phrase close}

<xen:title>{xen:phrase pirateProfile_delete_pirate_x, 'pirate={$pirate.name}'}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:members, $user}">{$user.username}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:pirates, $user}">{xen:phrase pirateProfile_pirates}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link 'pirates/delete', $pirate}" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay" id="pirateProfileDelete" data-redirect="on">
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd> <input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase pirateProfile_delete_pirate}" class="button primary" /> </dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> <input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase pirateProfile_action_pirate, 'action={xen:phrase edit}'}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:members, $user}">{$user.username}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:pirates, $user}">{xen:phrase pirateProfile_pirates}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link 'pirates/save', $pirate}" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay AutoValidator" id="pirateProfileEdit" data-redirect="on"> <xen:include template="pirateProfile_form"> <xen:set var="$action">{xen:phrase edit}</xen:set> </xen:include> </form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase pirateProfile_delete_pirate_comment_by_x, 'name={$comment.username}'}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:members, $user}">{$user.username}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:pirates, $user}">{xen:phrase pirateProfile_pirates}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:pirates/card, $pirate}">{$pirate.name}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link 'pirates/comment-delete', $pirate, 'comment={$comment.pirate_comment_id}'}" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay"> <dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd> <input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase delete_comment}" class="button primary" /> <input type="reset" value="{xen:phrase close}" class="button OverlayCloser overlayOnly" /> </dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" /> <input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase pirateProfile_edit_profile_post_comment_by_x, 'name={$comment.username}'}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:members, $user}">{$user.username}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link 'pirates/comment-edit', $pirate, 'comment={$comment.pirate_comment_id}'}" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay"> <dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_message">{xen:phrase message}:</label></dt> <dd><textarea name="message" id="ctrl_message" class="textCtrl Elastic" rows="2">{$comment.message}</textarea></dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd> <input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase save_changes}" accesskey="s" class="button primary" /> </dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase pirateProfile_comment_on_pirate_x, 'pirate={$pirate.name}'}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:members, $user}">{$user.username}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:pirates, $user}">{xen:phrase pirateProfile_pirates}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link 'pirates/comment', $pirate}" method="post" class="xenForm">
<dl class="ctrlUnit fullWidth"> <dt></dt> <dd> <textarea name="message" class="textCtrl Elastic" rows="2" autofocus="true"></textarea> </dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd><input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase post_comment}" accesskey="s" class="button primary" /></dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>

<xen:title>{$pirate.name} - {xen:if $like, '{xen:phrase pirateProfile_unlike_pirate}', '{xen:phrase pirateProfile_like_pirate}'}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:members, $user}">{$user.username}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:pirates, $user}">{xen:phrase pirateProfile_pirates}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link 'pirates/like', $pirate}" method="post" class="xenForm">
<dl class="ctrlUnit fullWidth"> <dt></dt> <dd> <xen:if is="{$like}"> {xen:phrase pirateProfile_you_sure_you_want_to_unlike_this_pirate} <xen:else /> {xen:phrase pirateProfile_you_sure_you_want_to_like_this_pirate} </xen:if> </dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd><input type="submit" value="{xen:if $like, '{xen:phrase pirateProfile_unlike_pirate}', '{xen:phrase pirateProfile_like_pirate}'}" accesskey="s" class="button primary" autofocus="true" /></dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>

{$pirate.name} - {xen:phrase pirateProfile_members_who_liked_this_pirate} {$user.username} {xen:phrase pirateProfile_pirates}
{xen:phrase close}

<xen:title>{$pirate.name} - {xen:phrase pirateProfile_report_pirate}</xen:title> <xen:h1>{xen:phrase pirateProfile_report_pirate}</xen:h1>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:members, $user}">{$user.username}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:pirates, $user}">{xen:phrase pirateProfile_pirates}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link full:pirates/card, $pirate}">{$pirate.name}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link 'pirates/report', $pirate}" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay AutoValidator">
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_message">{xen:phrase report_reason}:</label></dt> <dd><textarea name="message" id="ctrl_message" rows="2" class="textCtrl Elastic"></textarea></dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd><input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase pirateProfile_report_pirate}" accesskey="s" class="button primary" /></dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>
• Pirates
• {xen:phrase loading}...

{xen:phrase pirateProfile_x_has_added_a_new_pirate_y, 'username={xen:helper username, $item.user, 'primaryText'}', 'pirate={$item.content.name}' } {xen:phrase pirateProfile_xs_pirate_y_has_joined_guild_z, 'username={xen:helper username, $item.user, 'primaryText'}', 'pirate={$item.content.name}', 'guild={$item.guild.new}' } {xen:phrase pirateProfile_xs_pirate_y_has, 'username={xen:helper username, $item.user, 'primaryText'}', 'pirate={$item.content.name}' } {xen:phrase pirateProfile_reached} {$skill} {xen:phrase pirateProfile_pirate_level} {$level}! {xen:phrase pirateProfile_leveled} {xen:phrase pirateProfile_up}! {xen:phrase pirateProfile_xs_pirate_y_has_gotten_new_name, 'username={xen:helper username, $item.user, 'primaryText'}', 'pirate={$item.content.name}' } {xen:phrase pirateProfile_xs_pirate_y_has_new_card_picture, 'username={xen:helper username, $item.user, 'primaryText'}', 'pirate={$item.content.name}' } {xen:phrase pirateProfile_xs_pirate_y_is_now_a_z_in_r, 'username={xen:helper username, $item.user, 'primaryText'}', 'pirate={$item.content.name}', 'rank={$item.rank.new}', 'type={$item.type}' } {xen:phrase pirateProfile_xs_pirate_y_has_been_updated, 'username={xen:helper username, $item.user, 'primaryText'}', 'pirate={$item.content.name}' } {xen:phrase pirateProfile_x_liked_ys_pirate, 'name={xen:helper username, $item.user, 'subject primaryText'}', 'username={xen:helper username, $item.owner}', 'pirate_attributes=href="{xen:link pirates/card, $item.content}" class="PopupItemLink OverlayTrigger" data-overlayoptions="{"fixed":false}"', 'pirate={$item.content.name}' }. {xen:phrase pirateProfile_x_liked_your_pirate, 'name={xen:helper username, $item.user, 'subject primaryText'}', 'pirate_attributes=href="{xen:link pirates/card, $item.content}" class="PopupItemLink OverlayTrigger" data-overlayoptions="{"fixed":false}"', 'pirate={$item.content.name}' }.

{xen:phrase pirateProfile_xs_pirates, 'username={$user.username}'} {$user.username} {xen:phrase pirateProfile_pirates}
